name: yt_translator
description: ### Setup 1. Install the requirements to your venv `pip install -r requirements.txt` 2. To be able to import enchant in python we'll need to install the Enchant C library (on Mac) 	* Run `brew install enchant` 	* Configure the environment variables by opening the shell config file (~/.bashrc or ~/.zshrc) and adding the lines: 	 `export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH="<PATH_TO_ENCHANT_INSTALL>:$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH" 	 export ENCHANT_LIBRARY_PATH="<PATH_TO_ENCHANT_INSTALL>"` 3. Configure environment variables: 	* OPENAI_API_KEY = <YOUR_API_KEY>
